title: Modern Duplex for Creative Living in Vibrant Ursynow
description: Step into a bright and spacious 136 sqm duplex designed for dynamic urban living. Cleverly laid out across two levels, this unique residence offers three sunlit bedrooms and three sleek modern bathrooms. The open-concept living area flows effortlessly into a contemporary kitchen fully equipped for culinary inspiration. Featuring smart home technology and ample storage, this space is perfect for functional style and expressive living.
neighborhood_description: Located in Warsaw’s leafy Ursynow district—a favorite among young professionals—this home offers a balance of urban vibrancy and local tranquility. Surrounded by parks and creative green spaces yet minutes from highways and airport, Ursynow also boasts excellent bike paths and extensive public transport linked to the city center.
lifestyle_benefits: easy access for exhibitions and events
walks and bike rides in nearby parks
target_buyer: Ideal for artists, designers, and young professionals seeking a flexible, luminous workspace at home and quick city connections.
market_positioning: Stands out for creative flexibility, contemporary amenities, and proximity to both nature and transit—a rare find for Warsaw’s growing artistic and professional class.
